function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement measures to prevent virus propagation, such as ventilation and air purification","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring and controlling factors affecting indoor environment, promoting natural ventilation","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Building resilience in various aspects of society, implementing social support programs, and creating climate adaptation strategies.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring and prioritizing essential services","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide accurate information and education about symptoms and infection risks, offer mental health support","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting domestic tourism, providing financial support to affected businesses","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement alternative food distribution programs, such as home delivery or community pick-up points. provide financial support to families to purchase food.","category":"Implement \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote use of face masks, implement air filtration systems, and limit passenger capacity in private car services.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provision of telepsychiatry services and social support systems","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and upgrading of ventilation systems, installation of hepa filters","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular veterinary check-ups, hygiene practices for pet care, and limiting close contact with pets if unwell.","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of demand response programs, promotion of energy efficiency measures, and investment in smart grid technologies.","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Partitioning to create anterooms","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring outdoor absolute humidity","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Training for healthcare professionals in conducting effective remote consultations, development of guidelines for when remote consultations are appropriate, and continuous monitoring of patient outcomes","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social safety nets, financial support for vulnerable populations","category":"Social safety nets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide specific protection and care for children with kawasaki syndrome and artery diseases.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement fact-checking processes and promote reliable sources of information","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further experimentation for certification and professional use, investment in research and expertise development","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough evaluation of multiple activation functions, including their impact on convergence, accuracy, and performance metrics","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing the hierarchy of controls approach to eliminate or substitute the hazardous agent or source of exposure before using direct uvgi in the operating room","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhance ventilation systems, increase fresh air intake, use air purifiers, and wear masks.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of adaptable finishing materials","category":"Selection of control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stimulate economic growth and investment in public health infrastructure","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase patch-level vector control by authorities","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Educating and raising awareness on the difference between uv-absorbing particles and awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of materials with low virus survivability","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Further research using a wide range of covariates and evaluation of the effectiveness of nphis","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Designing and modifying built forms to include open relaxation spaces, green
